delete.actionDescription: This action will be permanently deleted.
delete.decisionDescription: This decision will be permanently deleted.
delete.decisionImpact: Actions linked to this decision will be dissociated but kept.
delete.meetingDescription: This meeting will be permanently deleted.
delete.meetingImpact: Actions linked to this meeting will be dissociated but kept.
delete.projectDescription: This project will be permanently deleted with all its dependencies.
delete.projectImpact: All decisions and actions in this project will also be deleted. Linked meetings will not be deleted.

contact.title: Legal

confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.description: How PILOTYS processes and protects your personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: PILOTYS is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how your personal data is processed when you use the service.

dataCollection.title: Data Processing
dataCollection.content:
PILOTYS processes only the data strictly necessary to provide access to the service, including:
- Account information (email address, authentication data)
- Technical connection data required for security and service operation

Content provided by the user (such as meeting notes, decisions or texts) is processed only at the explicit request of the user and is not stored durably by PILOTYS.

dataUsage.title: Purpose of Processing
dataUsage.content:
Personal data is processed exclusively to:
- Provide access to the PILOTYS service
- Execute the functionalities explicitly requested by the user
- Ensure the security, maintenance and proper operation of the service
- Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

dataProtection.title: Data Security
dataProtection.content: PILOTYS implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, loss or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
- Right of access
- Right to rectification
- Right to erasure
- Right to restriction of processing

Requests can be submitted at any time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any question regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at: legal@pilotys.io

cgu.title: Terms of Use
cgu.description: Terms of use of the PILOTYS platform

acceptance.title: Acceptance of the Terms
acceptance.content: Accessing and using the PILOTYS platform implies full and unconditional acceptance of these Terms of Use.

service.title: Service Description
service.content:
PILOTYS is an online software application (SaaS) designed for managing projects, decisions and professional actions. The service is intended as a decision-support and organizational tool.

The service is provided "as is" and may be modified or updated at any time for technical, functional or maintenance reasons.

account.title: User Account
account.content: Use of PILOTYS requires the creation of a user account using a valid email address. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials and for all activities carried out under their account.

usage.title: Permitted Use
usage.content:
The user agrees to use PILOTYS solely in a lawful and professional manner. It is strictly prohibited to:
- use the service for illegal or fraudulent purposes
- attempt to access other users' data
- disrupt or compromise the proper functioning of the platform

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All elements of the PILOTYS platform (software, interface, design, brand, content) are protected by intellectual property laws and remain the exclusive property of Rania MOUTAWAFIQ, operating under the trade name PILOTYS.

All content provided or processed by the user remains the property of the user.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content:
PILOTYS is a decision-support tool. The publisher does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or relevance of the information generated or processed through the service.

The user remains solely responsible for any decisions, actions or uses made based on information obtained via PILOTYS. The publisher shall not be held liable for any indirect damages, data loss, financial loss or commercial harm.

modifications.title: Changes to the Terms
modifications.content: These Terms of Use may be modified at any time. The applicable version is the one in force at the time the service is used.

cgv.title: Terms of Sale
cgv.description: Terms governing subscriptions and paid services of PILOTYS

scope.title: Scope
scope.content: These Terms of Sale apply to all paid subscriptions and services offered by PILOTYS to professional users.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Subscription prices are indicated in euros, exclusive of taxes unless otherwise stated. PILOTYS reserves the right to modify its pricing at any time. Any price change will not apply to an ongoing subscription period.

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.content: Subscriptions are concluded for a fixed period (monthly or annual) and are automatically renewed unless cancelled by the user prior to the end of the current billing period.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Payments are processed via Stripe, a secure third-party payment service provider. Payment is due immediately upon subscription. PILOTYS does not store any payment card information.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: The user may cancel their subscription at any time from their account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current subscription period, with no interruption of service during that period.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.content: Subscriptions grant immediate access to the PILOTYS service. As such, no refunds are issued for any subscription period already started, except where mandatory under applicable law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding subscriptions or billing, you may contact us at: billing@pilotys.io

outlook.title: Outlook
outlook.subtitle: Connect your Outlook calendar to easily import and analyze your meetings.
outlook.mainDescription: Automatically import your meetings into PILOTYS to better track them and derive actions.
outlook.feature1Description: Your meetings are automatically imported from your Outlook calendar.
outlook.feature2Description: Find your Outlook meetings here to import them in one click into PILOTYS.

outlook.syncErrorUnauthorized: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
outlook.syncErrorForbidden: You do not have the necessary permissions to sync Outlook.
outlook.syncErrorRateLimit: Too many requests. Please try again in a few moments.
outlook.changeAccountWarningMessage: The currently connected Outlook account will be disconnected.
